review: For the price, this is an amazing product.  I use this for my bedroom TV to stream Netflix and my Google Play Music. The set up was beyond easy.  I will often hear people question the need for this device when a 360, PS3 or Apple TV all do the same things and have more features.  My answer is this: Price.  My main TV has a 360 but I'm not going to buy an additional console to simply get stream some movies from bed.  I love that I can use my phone or tablet to send content to it and not deplete my device's battery.The biggest con I have for this device is the lack of compatible apps. It's still a newer device and new content will be added.
author: Dan C

review: It does work as expected. Can it be better? Yes. There is lag when streaming from a browser and sometimes the audio is a little off. Connection speed is key here, and also how busy your home network may be. Some case others may be downloading or streaming as well and this will affect the quality.
